img_above_text:
Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
Past the Celestial Pill, there will be a large pillar decoration, with a passage on the other side leading down to an open cave below the temple.
img_below_text:
Here, you’ll find a large group of unique enemies not found elsewhere - Civet Sergeants. These small cat-like Yaoguai are armed with two swords apiece, and are led by an emboldened Civet Sergeant who boasts more health and attack, as he drops the Civet Sergeant Spirit when killed.
![Wukong Tiger 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d6/Wukong_Tiger_26.jpg)
summary_promot:

        - Preceding Text: "Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
Past the Celestial Pill, there will be a large pillar decoration, with a passage on the other side leading down to an open cave below the temple."
        - Following Text: "Here, you’ll find a large group of unique enemies not found elsewhere - Civet Sergeants. These small cat-like Yaoguai are armed with two swords apiece, and are led by an emboldened Civet Sergeant who boasts more health and attack, as he drops the Civet Sergeant Spirit when killed.
![Wukong Tiger 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d6/Wukong_Tiger_26.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character engaged in battle within a dimly lit, rocky cave environment. The preceding and following text suggests this area is located below a temple, where unique enemies called Civet Sergeants, small cat-like creatures armed with dual swords, are encountered. The interface displays health, stamina, and abilities, emphasizing the game's action-oriented mechanics.
